item.description:
@WowILikeToCode wrote:

this is my code.

else if (cmd[0].equals("godwars")) { p.teleportTo(2881, 5310, 2, 4, 0, 8939, 8941, 1576, 0, 1577, 0); p.frames.showInterface(p, 601); p.frames.sendMessage(p, "Welcome to Godwars."); p.frames.setString(p,""+ p.apoints +"", 601, 6); //amardyl p.frames.setString(p,""+ p.points +"", 601, 7); //bandos p.frames.setString(p,""+ p.spoints +"", 601, 8); //sara p.frames.setString(p,""+ p.zpoints +"", 601, 9); //zammy p.frames.setTab(p, 8, 601);
